data.description:
Experience an ocean in your home!
- over 100 hundred sea creatures and (updated) bonus level 50+ toy sized land animals/dinosaurs
- August 2024 update: added object s position save state and custom mixed reality visual boundary to various areas and added a bonus jungle area
- full Passthrough / Mixed Reality, Handtracking
- move, delete, spawn animals to create your own ocean home! 
- turtles, sharks, whales, dolphins, clown fish, starfish, crocodiles, octopus, extinct dinosaur fish, piranha, and a wide variety of exotic and common sea creatures! + much more!
-  bonus toy / table top land animals include:  rhino, elephant, t-rex, deer, crocodile, tiger, leopard, hippo, zebra, dogs, cats, various farms animals and dinosaurs, and more!
- 10 scenes to explore, all with ability to spawn & delete fish and to move stationary fish:
— feed swimming fish to a shark, feed fish to swimming sharks
— swimming fish on random spawn
— varying pre-made fish scenes
— 2 scenes full of turtles
— empty scene to spawn fish
— mammals only

changelog.change_log: Fixed bugs in table top animal areas.
Major improvement to hand tracking, added another jungle bonus area, minor bug fixes, and global performance improvement

Added animal save state and custom mixed reality visual boundaries to 2 ocean levels. Added a bonus jungle level where you can save the jungle and animal positions to create a home zoo. Added a new table top animal bonus area where the tables can be toggled off and animal save state is enabled.

Updates
- bonus level with over 50 small table top sized animals 
- added experimental levels to copy and enlarge animals
- fixed bug: player now always spawns and correct location
- fixed minor bugs related to deleting animals and collisions
- FYI updated SDK version used to build this app
Added ability to toggle hand model appearance (tap right joystick as a button), added dolphin level, added cuttlefish level.
